verses.verse: Now there cried<WH6817> a certain<WH259> woman<WH802> of the wives<WH802> of the sons<WH1121> of the prophets<WH5030> to Elisha,<WH477> saying,<WH559> Your servant<WH5650> my husband<WH376> is dead;<WH4191> and you know<WH3045> that your servant<WH5650> did fear<WH3373> the LORD:<WH3068> and the creditor<WH5383> is come<WH935> to take<WH3947> to him my two<WH8147> sons<WH3206> to be slaves.<WH5650>

Then she came<WH935> and told<WH5046> the man<WH376> of God.<WH430> And he said,<WH559> Go,<WH3212> sell<WH4376> the oil,<WH8081> and pay<WH7999> your debt,<WH5386> and live<WH2421> you and your children<WH1121> of the rest.<WH3498>

And it fell<WH1961> on a day,<WH3117> that Elisha<WH477> passed<WH5674> to Shunem,<WH7766> where<WH8033> was a great<WH1419> woman;<WH802> and she constrained<WH2388> him to eat<WH398> bread.<WH3899> And so it was, that as oft<WH1767> as he passed<WH5674> by, he turned<WH5493> in thither<WH8033> to eat<WH398> bread.<WH3899>

And she said<WH559> to her husband,<WH376> Behold<WH2009> now,<WH4994> I perceive<WH3045> that this<WH1931> is an holy<WH6918> man<WH376> of God,<WH430> which passes<WH5674> by us continually.<WH8548>

Let us make<WH6213> a little<WH6996> chamber,<WH5944> I pray<WH4994> you, on the wall;<WH7023> and let us set<WH7760> for him there<WH8033> a bed,<WH4296> and a table,<WH7979> and a stool,<WH3678> and a candlestick:<WH4501> and it shall be, when he comes<WH935> to us, that he shall turn<WH5493> in thither.<WH8033>
And it fell<WH1961> on a day,<WH3117> that he came<WH935> thither,<WH8033> and he turned<WH5493> into<WH413> the chamber,<WH5944> and lay<WH7901> there.<WH8033>
And he said<WH559> to Gehazi<WH1522> his servant,<WH5288> Call<WH7121> this<WH2063> Shunammite.<WH7767> And when he had called<WH7121> her, she stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> him.

And he said<WH559> to him, Say<WH559> now<WH4994> to her, Behold,<WH2009> you have been careful<WH2729> for us with all<WH3605> this<WH2063> care;<WH2731> what<WH4100> is to be done<WH6213> for you? would<WH3426> you be spoken<WH1696> for to the king,<WH4428> or<WH176> to the captain<WH8269> of the host?<WH6635> And she answered,<WH559> I dwell<WH3427> among<WH8432> my own people.<WH5971>
And he said,<WH559> What<WH4100> then is to be done<WH6213> for her? And Gehazi<WH1522> answered,<WH559> Truly<WH61> she has no<WH369> child,<WH1121> and her husband<WH376> is old.<WH2204>
And he said,<WH559> Call<WH7121> her. And when he had called<WH7121> her, she stood<WH5975> in the door.<WH6607>

And the woman<WH802> conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son<WH1121> at that season<WH4150> that Elisha<WH477> had said<WH1696> to her, according to the time<WH6256> of life.<WH2416>

And he said<WH559> to his father,<WH1> My head,<WH7218> my head.<WH7218> And he said<WH559> to a lad,<WH5288> Carry<WH5375> him to his mother.<WH517>
And when he had taken<WH5375> him, and brought<WH935> him to his mother,<WH517> he sat<WH3427> on<WH5921> her knees<WH1290> till<WH5704> noon,<WH6672> and then died.<WH4191>
And she went<WH5927> up, and laid<WH7901> him on<WH5921> the bed<WH4296> of the man<WH376> of God,<WH430> and shut<WH5462> the door on him, and went<WH3318> out.

And he said,<WH559> Why<WH4069> will you go<WH1980> to him to day?<WH3117> it is neither<WH3808> new<WH2320> moon,<WH2320> nor<WH3808> sabbath.<WH7676> And she said,<WH559> It shall be well.<WH7965>

Then she saddled<WH2280> an ass,<WH860> and said<WH559> to her servant,<WH5288> Drive,<WH5090> and go<WH3212> forward; slack<WH6113> not your riding<WH7392> for me, except<WH3588> <WH518> I bid<WH559> you.

So she went<WH3212> and came<WH935> to the man<WH376> of God<WH430> to mount<WH2022> Carmel.<WH3760> And it came<WH1961> to pass, when the man<WH376> of God<WH430> saw<WH7200> her afar<WH5048> off, that he said<WH559> to Gehazi<WH1522> his servant,<WH5288> Behold,<WH2009> yonder is that Shunammite:<WH7767>

Run<WH7323> now,<WH6258> I pray<WH4994> you, to meet<WH7125> her, and say<WH559> to her, Is it well<WH7965> with you? is it well<WH7965> with your husband?<WH376> is it well<WH7965> with the child?<WH3206> And she answered,<WH559> It is well:<WH7965>

And when she came<WH935> to the man<WH376> of God<WH430> to the hill,<WH2022> she caught<WH2388> him by the feet:<WH7272> but Gehazi<WH1522> came<WH5066> near<WH5066> to thrust<WH1920> her away. And the man<WH376> of God<WH430> said,<WH559> Let her alone;<WH7503> for her soul<WH5315> is vexed<WH4843> within her: and the LORD<WH3068> has hid<WH5956> it from me, and has not told<WH5046> me.

Then he said<WH559> to Gehazi,<WH1522> Gird<WH2296> up your loins,<WH4975> and take<WH3947> my staff<WH4938> in your hand,<WH3027> and go<WH3212> your way: if<WH3588> you meet<WH4672> any man,<WH376> salute<WH1288> him not; and if<WH3588> any<WH376> salute<WH1288> you, answer<WH6030> him not again: and lay<WH7760> my staff<WH4938> on the face<WH6440> of the child.<WH5288>

And the mother<WH517> of the child<WH5288> said,<WH559> As the LORD<WH3068> lives,<WH2416> and as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> I will not leave<WH5800> you. And he arose,<WH6965> and followed<WH3112> <WH310> her.

And Gehazi<WH1522> passed<WH5674> on before<WH6440> them, and laid<WH7760> the staff<WH4938> on the face<WH6440> of the child;<WH5288> but there was neither<WH369> voice,<WH6963> nor<WH369> hearing.<WH7182> Why he went<WH7725> again<WH7725> to meet<WH7125> him, and told<WH5046> him, saying,<WH559> The child<WH5288> is not awaked.<WH6974>
And when Elisha<WH477> was come<WH935> into the house,<WH1004> behold,<WH2009> the child<WH5288> was dead,<WH4191> and laid<WH7901> on his bed.<WH4296>

Then she went<WH935> in, and fell<WH5307> at<WH5921> his feet,<WH7272> and bowed<WH7812> herself to the ground,<WH776> and took<WH5375> up her son,<WH1121> and went<WH3318> out.
